mapper.select: select id, like_user_id, status, video_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from video_liked where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into video_liked(like_user_id, status, video_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{likeUserId}, #{status}, #{videoId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into video_liked(like_user_id, status, video_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.likeUserId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.videoId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into video_liked(like_user_id, status, video_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.likeUserId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.videoId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update like_user_id = values(like_user_id), status = values(status), video_id = values(video_id), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update video_liked
like_user_id = #{likeUserId},
status = #{status},
video_id = #{videoId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
